fields.label: Project Title
fields.question: What's the official name of this project?
fields.help_text: Use the user-provided project title or the first heading from the uploaded scope document.

fields.label: Sponsor
fields.question: Who is sponsoring this project?
fields.help_text: Identify the primary project sponsor responsible for funding or approvals.

fields.label: Project Lead
fields.question: Who is leading the project day to day?
fields.help_text: Capture the name of the project lead (usually the logged-in PM).

fields.label: Start Date
fields.question: When does the project start? Use YYYY-MM-DD.
fields.help_text: Parse the project start date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).

fields.label: End Date
fields.question: When should the project wrap up? Use YYYY-MM-DD.
fields.help_text: Parse the project end date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).

fields.label: Vision
fields.question: What vision or objective should this project achieve?
fields.help_text: Summarize the high-level vision or objectives of the project.
fields.example: Deliver a unified CRM platform to improve sales visibility.

fields.label: Problem
fields.question: Which problem or opportunity is the project addressing?
fields.help_text: Describe the problem or opportunity addressed by the project.
fields.example: Disconnected legacy systems limit customer insights.

fields.label: Project Description
fields.question: Provide a short narrative that explains the project scope and goals.
fields.help_text: Provide a brief narrative description of the project including context and goals.
fields.example: Implement Salesforce across regions with phased adoption.

fields.label: Scope In
fields.question: List the items that fall in scope. Separate entries with commas or new lines.
fields.help_text: List the items explicitly included in scope.
fields.placeholder: Items that are included in scope

fields.label: Scope Out
fields.question: List the items that are explicitly out of scope.
fields.help_text: List the items explicitly excluded from scope.
fields.placeholder: Items that are excluded from scope

fields.label: Risks
fields.question: Call out any known risks the project team is tracking.

fields.label: Assumptions
fields.question: Document the key assumptions you are making.

fields.label: Milestones
fields.question: Outline major milestones including the phase, deliverable, and target date for each entry.
fields.help_text: List project milestones with associated phases, deliverables, and target dates.

fields.label: Success Metrics
fields.question: Describe the success metrics, pairing the benefit, the metric, and the measurement system.
fields.help_text: List success metrics with benefit, metric, and system of measurement.
fields.example: Reduce onboarding time / Cycle time / HRIS analytics

fields.label: Core Team
fields.question: List the core team members along with their role and responsibilities.
fields.help_text: Create one entry per team member with name, role, and optional responsibilities.
fields.example: Taylor Reed / Technical Lead / Owns integrations
